preview.title: Product Release Preview
preview.noTabs: Seems like there's a problem with your Zip file.
preview.hint: Only .zip file is allowed and file size should be smaller than 20MB.
preview.link: See how to configure a valid README.
preview.hintContent:
Follow the README template strictly. Ensure the following.


# Your Product Name

Hello, this is our connector.

## Demo

You should show the demo content here.

## Setup

This session should show how to download, setup your product,...

```
@variables.yaml@
```
  • In case you want to pass variables to README file, put in template as above and declare a file name variables.yaml
  • SETUP AND DEMO These headings should always be in English, regardless of the language.
  • Ensure SETUP AND DEMO follow the template's predefined headings and structure.
  • Images should use the following format ![image-name](image-directory.png)

introduction.about: The Axon Ivy market offers a unique experience to accelerate process automation.
introduction.contribute: Here you will find connectors to standard software solutions from leading providers such as Microsoft, Amazon, or Adobe, as well as ready-made process models, business solutions, and practical tools for document processing, storage, or signing.
introduction.link: Contribute to the community and build your own connector!

error.fullMessage: {{ errorMessage }} You would be doing us a great favor by reporting it here: support@axonivy.com

description.400: Bad Request: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.
description.401: Unauthorized: Authentication is required and has failed or has not been provided.
description.403: Forbidden: The server understood the request but refuses to authorize it.
description.404: Not Found: Our website is taking a break. It seems that we cannot find the page you requested.
description.408: Request Timeout: The server timed out waiting for the request.
description.500: Internal Server Error: The server encountered an unexpected condition.
description.502: Bad Gateway: The server received an invalid response from an upstream server.
description.503: Service Unavailable: The server is temporarily unable to handle the request.
description.504: Gateway Timeout: The upstream server failed to send a request in time.
description.default: Our website is taking a break.

common.nothingFound:
Your search did not yield any results.
Please modify your search terms or browse our categories for related content.

footer.newVersionsInfo: Get the latest stable Long Term Support version of the Axon Ivy Platform - or download the Leading Edge version.

maven.label: Maven
maven.description: You can consume it as maven artifact in your pom.xml

download.appArtifactHint: To include all necessary and usable dependencies to deploy directly to Axon Ivy Engine, please check this checkbox!
download.zipAppArtifactLabel: Create a ZIP file to deploy on the Axon Ivy Engine

feedback.label: Feedback
feedback.successMessage: Your feedback has been successfully submitted!
feedback.informMessage: Your comment will be published after approval.
feedback.addFeedbackDescription:
By providing your feedback, you enable us to continuously improve our products and consistently deliver the best quality to you. Of course, our Code of Conduct applies here as well:
  • Be friendly and patient.
  • Be welcoming.
  • Be considerate.
  • Be respectful.
  • Be careful in the words that you choose.
  • When we disagree, try to understand why.
feedback.noFeedbackForConnectorLabel: There is no feedback for this connector yet.
feedback.noFeedbackForSolutionLabel: There is no feedback for this solution yet.
feedback.noFeedbackForUtilityLabel: There is no feedback for this utility yet.
feedback.noFeedbackSecondLabel: Be the first to share your opinion.

approval.about: Please review the feedback from a user.
approval.instruction: The feedback given should follow our Code of Conduct to be approved.
approval.description: Ensure only the best feedback moves forward.
approval.enterToken: Please enter your token to access the feedback approval page.

externalDocument.pageHeader: The document of the {{product}} for version {{version}}
externalDocument.helpText: The document is not ready to render or has not been published. Please try again later.

dashboard.title: Axon Ivy Market – Monitoring
dashboard.subtitle: This page summarizes the monitoring results of the Axon Ivy Market Extensions – including build pipelines (CI/DEV), end-to-end tests, and unit test results. The source code is open source and available on GitHub.
dashboard.noReport: There is no test report in this workflow.

buildTooltip.ci: Uses a fixed Ivy version to verify that the connector works with the official release.
buildTooltip.dev: Validates whether the connector is compatible with the latest Ivy API (nightly build).
buildTooltip.e2e: Validates our code works with the real API and confirms the endpoint is active and correct.
